titles.title: Prevention of Bureaucratic Workarounds Act
To ensure a legislative solution for those individuals who may be affected by ObamaCare's unlawful implementation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
6/9/2015--Introduced. Prevention of Bureaucratic Workarounds Act
This bill prohibits the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) from entering into a contract with a state or awarding assistance to a state to provide the state with technology from the federal health insurance exchange.
